description: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(A014580(n)) = A000040(a(n)), a(A091242(n)) = A002808(a(n)), where A000040(n) = n-th prime, A002808(n) = n-th composite number, and A014580(n) and A091242(n) are binary codes for n-th irreducible and n-th reducible polynomial over GF(2), respectively.
